It's administrative center is the city of Uzhhorod, also the center of the surrounding oblast. Population: ==Administrative division== The raion is divided into 14 hromadas. ===Cities=== Name Ukrainian Hungarian Population Uzhhorod Ужгород Ungvár 115,568 Chop Чоп Csap 8,870 ===Towns=== Name
